mapper.insert:

userID,

name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gold = #{gold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userSkin = #{userskin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userColumnSkin = #{usercolumnskin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where userID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gold = #{gold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userSkin = #{userskin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userColumnSkin = #{usercolumnskin,jdbcType=INTEGER} where userID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
